name: naive-ui
description: A Vue UI Framework. Caring About Styles, Themed, Batteries Included, Not Rather Slow.

scripts.build:js: npm run gen-version && npm run clean && tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json && tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.json && node scripts/post-build
scripts.build:package: npm run gen-version && npm run clean && node scripts/pre-build/deprecated-build-icons.js && tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json && tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.json && node scripts/post-build
scripts.build:site: npm run build:package && ./scripts/pre-build-site/pre-build-site.sh && node scripts/pre-build-site/restore-side-effects && cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 vite build && rm -rf node_modules/naive-ui && cp site/index.html site/404.html && node scripts/post-build-site/clear-side-effects
scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run gen-version && cross-env NODE_ENV=development vite
scripts.dev:ts: npm run clean && npm run gen-version && cross-env NODE_ENV=development TUSIMPLE=true vite
scripts.lint: npm run lint:code && npm run lint:type
scripts.format: npm run format:code && npm run format:md
scripts.release:package: npm run build:package && npm publish --tag next
scripts.tusimple:dev: npm run generate && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack-dev-server --config build/webpack.tusimple-dev.js
scripts.tusimple:build:doc: npm run generate && npm run build && rm -rf build-doc/dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config build/webpack.tusimple-doc.js
scripts.tusimple:release:doc: npm run tusimple:build:doc && node build-doc/generate-deploy-sh.js && sudo bash build-doc/deploy-doc.sh

author: 07akioni
